Description: Matches line repetition (Wall of text spam)
Matches Wide Text (A E S T H E T I C spam)
Matches "Spaced Out" malware links (h t t p)
Matches "Who is this?" (Mass DM bot reply)
Matches "I want to be your friend" bots
Matches "Level Up" spam (If using leveling bots)
Matches Hiding text in code blocks
Matches "Fancy Font" Generators (Mathematical Alphanumeric Symbols often used to bypass filters)
Matches Vertical Text (One char per line spam)
Matches Symbol Injection (breaking words with punctuation i.e. b.a.d)
Matches ANSI Color Codes (Used to fake system messages in code blocks)
Matches Regional Indicator Spilling (Writing words with giant flag letters)
Matches Broken URLs (bracketed dots to avoid link detection like google[.]com)
Matches "Send this to X people" spam
